attributes.additional_details:
Lauri Love stands accused and indicted of illegally accessing a number of US government computer systems.

So far the US has not requested extradition but this is a very likely possibility.

In light of recent revelations of the extent the US's illegal spying network and internet surveillance carried out by the NSA and other authorities we the undersigned petition the Home Office to refuse any extradition requests by the US for Lauri Love and for his case to be dealt with in the UK under UK law.
